_description: Repent now — two couplets translating ‘Peniteant miseri dum temus sit miserendi…’ which precedes them in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Wil time is of forȝeuingAmend þe of þi wikke
                    leuingffor afterward þe time sal comeÞat forȝefnesse
                    sal ben þe benome
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 63.
